# Welcome
Welcome to the second StepuP meeting. In this meeting we will host some workshops and hands on sessions to analyse EEG, EMG and motion capture data.

![](treadmill_walking.jpg){width="50%" fig-align="center"}

## Timetable
The meeting will be held on the 29th and 30th of November in Zurich.
The first day will consist of pratical data analysis and short presentations. The second day will be a full day of fun.

### Day 1 (Friday, 29th of November)

The first day will be held hybrid ( [Zoom link](https://uni-kiel.zoom-x.de/j/2918653959?pwd=dDhiclU1RVlpSmhyVDlvZU03czczUT09) ) with some people in Zürich and some people joining online. We will start at 7:30 am localtime and end after the last lecture has finished.

## Location
The meeting will be held at the [ETH](https://www.ethz.ch/en/) in Zürich.

## Transportation
If you are familiar with using a bike, an easy way to get around in Zürich is by bike. With [PubliBike](https://www.publibike.ch/en/map) you can rent bikes/e-bikes in many places around the city.
Alternatively the use of the public transport (trams, buses) is recommended. There are different options for single tickets and multi-cards available. 

## Accomodation
If you want to stay in Zürich, we recommend these two accomodations:
-   [ibis Styles Zurich City Center](https://all.accor.com/hotel/B5J7/index.de.shtml) (close to ETH)
-   [25hours Hotel Zürich West](https://all.accor.com/hotel/B145/index.de.shtml)
-   [Guesthouse fürDich](https://en.fuerdich.ch/guesthouse) (cheaper, more hostel like)
